---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
root.dir <- file.path(getwd(),"../..")
setwd(root.dir)
# load library to read excel files
library(readxl)
# read in choice assay data
Choice_Assay_Data <- read_excel("data/Choice_Assay/Choice_Assay_Data.xlsx")
# read in larval calibration data
L4_Cal <- read_excel("data/Choice_Assay/Choice_Assay_Data.xlsx",
sheet = "L4 larval calibration")
# rename columns for r format
names(L4_Cal) <- c("vial.id","wet.mass.mg","dry.mass.mg","notes")
# declare linear model for calibration (wet-dry mass)
model <- lm(L4_Cal,formula = dry.mass.mg~wet.mass.mg)
# plot dry~wet mass
plot(L4_Cal$dry.mass.mg~L4_Cal$wet.mass.mg)
# add our linear model to the plot
abline(model)
# summarize model (R^2)
summary(model)
```
